TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ColorTranslator extends System.Object

summary.span: 将颜色翻译成 GDI+ 结构并从该结构翻译颜色。

span.span: Translates colors to and from GDI+ structures.
This class cannot be inherited.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Drawing.Color FromHtml (string htmlColor);
.method public static hidebysig valuetype System.Drawing.Color FromHtml(string htmlColor) cil managed
Public Shared Function FromHtml (htmlColor As String) As Color
public: static System::Drawing::Color FromHtml(System::String ^ htmlColor);

param.name: htmlColor
param.span: 要翻译的 Html 颜色的字符串表示形式。

span.span: The string representation of the Html color to translate.

summary.span: 将 HTML 颜色表示形式翻译成 GDI+ 结构。

span.span: Translates an HTML color representation to a GDI+ structure.

returns.span: 表示已翻译的 HTML 颜色或 的 结构（如果 为 ）。

span.span: The structure that represents the translated HTML color or if is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将转换的字符串表示形式的 HTML 颜色名称，如蓝色或红色，为 GDI +结构。This method translates a string representation of an HTML color name, such as Blue or Red, to a GDI+ structure. ## Examples 下面的示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码将翻译到 HTML 颜色名称结构，然后使用该颜色填充的矩形。The code translates an HTML color name to a structure, and then uses that color to fill a rectangle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/VB/form1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 不是有效的 HTML 颜色名称。

span.span: is not a valid HTML color name.

span.span: The structure that represents the translated OLE color.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码将翻译的 OLE 颜色值到结构，然后使用该颜色填充的矩形。The code translates an OLE color value to a structure, and then uses that color to fill a rectangle. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码将翻译 Windows 颜色值到结构，然后使用该颜色填充的矩形。The code translates a Windows color value to a structure, and then uses that color to fill a rectangle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/VB/form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static string ToHtml (System.Drawing.Color c);
.method public static hidebysig string ToHtml(valuetype System.Drawing.Color c) cil managed
Public Shared Function ToHtml (c As Color) As String
public: static System::String ^ ToHtml(System::Drawing::Color c);

span.span: The structure to translate.

summary.span: 将指定的 结构翻译成 HTML 字符串颜色表示形式。

span.span: Translates the specified structure to an HTML string color representation.

returns.span: 表示 HTML 颜色的字符串。

span.span: The string that represents the HTML color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将转换为 HTML 颜色的字符串表示形式的结构。This method translates a structure to a string representation of an HTML color. 这是常用的一种颜色，如"Red"、"Blue"或"绿色"、 名称和非字符串表示形式的数字的颜色值，如"FF33AA"。This is the commonly used name of a color, such as "Red", "Blue", or "Green", and not string representation of a numeric color value, such as "FF33AA". ## Examples 下面的示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码将翻译结构的字符串表示形式 HTML 颜色，且然后显示一个具有生成的字符串消息框。The code translates a structure to a string representation of an HTML color, and then shows a message box with the resulting string. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicColorTranslatorExamples/VB/form1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`，这是一个参数的事件处理程序。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码将翻译为整数，表示 OLE 颜色，然后显示一个具有生成的字符串消息框的结构。The code translates a structure to an integer that represents an OLE color, and then shows a message box with the resulting string.
